description: This file manages PostgreSQL database connection pooling, including initialization, retrieval, and closing of connections, with environment variable configuration and error handling.

methods.name: initDb
methods.description: Initializes a PostgreSQL connection pool using environment variables, sets up error handling, and verifies connection.

methods.name: getDb
methods.description: Returns the existing database connection pool, throws an error if not initialized.

methods.name: closeDb
methods.description: Closes the database connection pool and resets the pool variable.
